item.title: r8
item.description: The ROLL Recovery R8 is an award-winning leg massage tool that turns the dream of every day massage into reality. Providing instant, easy relief to sore and sorry legs, the R8 is your very own personal, portable leg masseuse.

item.title: r3
item.description: The ROLL Recovery R3 is a purpose-built foot roller that gives you sweet feet relief. Providing instant, easy relief to sore and sorry feet — including plantar fasciitis problems — the R3 is your very own personal, portable foot masseuse.
